name: Mushroom Matar Masala
description: Mushroom Matar Masala. Mushrooms and Peas in creamy tomato sauce. Easy Mushroom Masala Recipe. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Indian Recipe.

video.name: Mushroom Matar Masala - Mushrooms and Peas in Blender Masala Sauce
video.description:
Mushroom Matar Masala - Mushrooms and Peas with Easy Creamy Blender Masala Sauce. Vegan Indian Gluten-free Soy-free. * Links Below *

Full Recipe ---- http://www.veganricha.com/2016/08/mushroom-matar-masala.html

The masala sauce with mushrooms and peas is a satisfying flavorful meal. I add some spinach or greens and chickpeas. Serve over rice or cooked grains, with flabread or over toast for snack or breakfast. Easy and 20 minute active time in the kitchen and then let everything simmer for a delicious Matar Mushroom.

Music - AudioNetwork - Be Lucky (tom quick/adam drake)

recipeIngredient: 1  green chile (remove seeds to reduce heat if needed)
1/4 cup raw cashews (soaked for 15 mins if needed, use 1/3 cup for creamier sauce)

recipeInstructions.text: Blend onion, garlic, ginger, chile with a few tbsp of water to a puree in a blender.
recipeInstructions.name: Blend onion, garlic, ginger, chile with a few tbsp of water to a puree in a blender.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the above puree. Cook for 5 to 7 mins or until the onion smell is not raw. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the above puree. Cook for 5 to 7 mins or until the onion smell is not raw. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, blend tomatoes and cashews in the same blender until smooth. Blend for two 1 min cycles so the cashews are blended in. Add the pureed tomato puree, garam masala, paprika, and fenugreek to the skillet. Cook for 7 to 8 minutes.Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Meanwhile, blend tomatoes and cashews in the same blender until smooth. Blend for two 1 min cycles so the cashews are blended in. Add the pureed tomato puree, garam masala, paprika, and fenugreek to the skillet. Cook for 7 to 8 minutes.Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add mushrooms, peas, other veggies, 1/2 cup or more water, salt, sugar. I added a 1/2 cup cooked chickpeas as well as seen in the pictures. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add mushrooms, peas, other veggies, 1/2 cup or more water, salt, sugar. I added a 1/2 cup cooked chickpeas as well as seen in the pictures. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and cook for 10 mins or till the mushrooms are cooked to preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and cook for 10 mins or till the mushrooms are cooked to preference.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in spinach if using, taste adjust salt and heat. I usually add some cayenne.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in spinach if using, taste adjust salt and heat. I usually add some cayenne.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with cilantro and serve over rice, cooked grains or with flatbread.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with cilantro and serve over rice, cooked grains or with flatbread.
